talk.author: did:plc:w26zoxnwj5huptyvdnr2epha
talk.utter: Bernie was very clear that he was the message. So no.

talk.author: did:plc:w26zoxnwj5huptyvdnr2epha
talk.utter: Bernie could have thrown all his weight behind moving the party towards his policies. Instead he developed an "I alone can fix this" mentality that was all too Trumpian.
